nodes.text: Hu's Emporium was a weapons shop located in the grimy underbelly of Vorzyd V's capital city of Efavan. Owned by a Paigun named Kitak Hu, Hu's Emporium catered towards droids, which were often targets for theft on the crime-ridden "Gambler's World." Hu specialized in selling weapon harnesses that were outfitted with automatic weapons, so they could be used even by droids not programmed for combat.
